show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #62 Ryan Mahoney "Sheepenomics"
subtitle: #62 Ryan Mahoney "Sheepenomics"
summary:
Ryan Mahoney from Emigh Livestock in the Sacramento River delta joins us to talk about his seven generation family operation raising cattle and wool sheep. Ryan walks through how his sheep are peeled and where some of the wool eventually ends up.
